column1: The system shall allow users to login using a username and password.
The response time should be less than 2 seconds.
Users may update their profile information anytime.
The application must support multiple languages.
Reports should be generated within 5 minutes of request.
The system might send email notifications for important updates.
The interface must be user-friendly and intuitive.
Data should be backed up daily.
The search function could return results in under 1 second.
The system should handle at least 1000 simultaneous users.
